intro.title: Introduction
list: "HelloWorld" -- 2018 Blockchain TRUE DApp Competition is initiated and guided by China Cloud System Pioneer Strategic Alliance and The Internet Industry Institute of Tsinghua University. It is co - hosted by TrueChain, Block Tech, and RegChain Finance, BTP, and BitTemple.

Established in the global blockchain industry, The competition is focusing on promoting applications of blockchain technology in different real-life scenarios and dedicated to find talents and projects with innovative capabilities in global blockchain field. The concept of "global open sourced community of blockchain technology" hence emerged at the right moment.

The blockchain application scenario is including but not limited to the fields of "public welfare, talents recruitment, education, traceability of agricultural products, finance, credit investigation and smart agriculture". For blockchain applications and products, the submitted work need a demo or a complete product demonstration.Each team can build practical needs according to the related field and scenario proposed by the competition. The experts will review the code, the conception, design and the actual works of the project, then select the most practical applications that meet the requirements through the voting and scoring system.

About the organizer: TrueGlobal is initiates by developer communities around the world, and is aimed at building and empowering a global ecosystem of TRUE developers and entrepreneurs through teaching and promoting of new technologies. To achieve this goal, we participate in and organize online and offline technical discussions, Hackathon, and blockchain application landing contests around the world.

topic.title: Suggested Dapp topics for reference
topic.description_1: The conflict between security, efficiency and decentralization for public blockchain is solved by TrueChain using the PBFT-fPoW hybrid consensus technology called Minerva.TrueChain uses PBFT as fast-chain to process transactions, and leave the oversight and election of PBFT to the hands of PoW nodes. Besides, TrueChain integrates fruitchain technology into the traditional PoW protocol i.e. fPoW, so that common users could have the opportunity to participate in mining. TrueChain also added sharding on top of PBFT to lift the limit of scalability.TrueChain has a very fast transaction confirmation speed, which can provide a stable and efficient platform for the landing of various commercial applications. Therefore, some efficient and interesting applications can be made based on TrueChain.
topic.description_2: All of the topics mentioned below need to be developed based on TrueChain.
topic.description_3: TrueGlobal selects the following topics for participants to consider. The topics are not mandatory, Participants can choose the topics by themselves, meanwhile, as more enterprises and organization joining the competition, TrueGlobal will add more actual demand under this topic.

list.title: DAPP market
list.description: A Dapp market that users can directly downloaded DAPPs to devices such as mobile terminals without installation. After the Dapps are uploaded to the application market, users can download directly without the installation process.

list.title: Multiple signature wallet
list.description: Develop a wallet app that requires a multiple signatures to transfer digital assets in the wallet. It mainly solves the problems of who participates in the signature, in what order, by what method, how to verify the signature, and how to guarantee the security.

list.title: Hardware wallet
list.description: Product need to make up of software and hardware, The private key is stored in the hardware and the transaction signature information is read in the software. At the same time, the private key cannot be read. Achieve private key isolation for a more secure protection of digital assets.

list.title: Decentralized private key management system
list.description: By using the BIP39 protocol, the same set of mnemonic words and different path management modes can be used to manage a set of tree-like user private key system. The private key at the top level can manage the private key at the bottom level, but the private key at the bottom level cannot manage the private key at the top level

list.title: smart contract formalization verification tool
list.description: Security is very important a smart contract! When writing smart contracts, formal verification tools are needed to check the syntax and basic logic of smart contracts to avoid low-level mistakes.

list.title: One click to send token
list.description: Develop a tool that are easy to distribute tokens in a specified format on TrueChain mainnet, for example, ERC20, ERC721, ERC1440, etc.

list.title: Tools to migrate tokens of ethereum to TrueChain mainnet
list.description: Develop a tool or cross-chain platform to transfer the token distributed on Ethereum or other public chains to TrueChain mainnet simultaneously, and realize other functions such as value delivery.

list.title: Client of GPU mining
list.description: Currently, TrueChain has developed a standard client of CPU mining and published the mining algorithm. According to this algorithm, mining clients suitable for GPU are developed and integrated, and Windows/Linux/MAC versions are provided too.

list.title: Decentralized trading platform
list.description: In a decentralized exchanges, the user's assets are directly saved in the user's own wallet, greatly reducing the risk of assets lost by stolen or caused by others reasons. The matching transaction is completed through smart contracts, and the clearing and settlement are processed on the public chain. While promoting the transparency, it also greatly reduces the dependence on central agency.

list.title: The random number generation tool in the blockchain games
list.description: In many application scenarios, we need to rely on the random number (dice). It is necessary to use technologies such as verifiable random function VRF to achieve randomness, unpredictability, but verifiable at the same time.

list.title: Rules in the blockchain games
list.description: Blockchain increases the transparency in the games. During the game development process, the game's core rules (bet) are published into the smart contracts of the blockchain. By invoking smart contracts, cheating can be avoid. Please design a game and make the rules on Chain.

list.title: Decentralized community platform/blog platform
list.description: A decentralized Social Media platform prevents fake information and or fake fans, so that users could enjoy sound social atmosphere.

list.title: Decentralized media
list.description: At present, all kinds of online media use centralized database to store articles, resulting in the occurrence of many kinds of defects such as deleting posts and modifying posts. The development of a decentralized media can store the information of articles on chain so the published articles can not be tampered.,

list.title: Traceability of charity donation
list.description: Since philanthropic funding is not transparent, blockchain technology can ensure that donors have a clear understanding of where their money is going and the donation can be checked. The tamper resist feature of blockchain technology can also ensure that the financial information on the chain cannot be tampered; Anonymity also protects the privacies of donors therefore they don’t  need to worry about the leak of personal information while showing their cares.

list.title: Traceability of agricultural products
list.description: Tracing of the gricultural product is the most complex and difficult part in food tracing. By using blockchain to build a cloud data processing center combining big data, cloud computing and Internet of things technology, we can connect the producers, regulators and consumers.

list.title: Entrepreneurship and innovation projects
list.description: Based on the traceability and non-tampering characteristics of blockchain, the voucher side can be connected with the capital side and the bill side. The holder of the voucher can use it as a guarantee, and transfer/payment can be achieved through smart contract.

list.title: Poverty alleviation projects
list.description: By using the traceability and non-tampering characteristics of blockchain technology to realize targeted poverty alleviation. In this way,the poverty-relief funds issued by the government can be clearly tracked.

vote.title: About the voting system
vote.description: The voting of the contest will be divided into 3 phases with multiple parties involved, and it will be conducted in a more decentralized method.
condition: 1、Crowd Voting. This part counts as 40% of the total votes and will start from December 20th, 2018. We use wechat voting mechanism to prevent ballot rigging. People need to follow the official wechat account - TrueGlobal to vote and each person can only vote once per day.

2、Voting between teams. This part count as for 30% of the votes starting from December 30th, and will be conducted via the website’s voting system. The representative of each team need to log in the website and vote for other teams, each team has 5 votes. They can vote for one team or multiple teams, but they cannot vote for their own teams.
3、Votes from the judges. This is the final phase, and it counts for 30% of the votes. It starts from January 5th, 2019, and each judge has 2 votes.
